title: If SKT wins the championship this year. For a second time...
body: Would it be possible for riot to upgrade the current ones to include new spell effects and stuff like that? Or will they just get a second skin?

replies.body: i dont think an upgrade would be fair to the new additions to the team, each of the champs ftmp are related to a particular player we have 3 new players who may not like the current team skin associated to their role. personally i want 5 new skins, and i think 5 new skins would make the most scenes
4 new players if you include Easyhoon and he sees a lot of play so I think it would be fair to give him a skin. (especially since Faker usually doesn't even use skins)
lol meant to put that but i dont know what riot stance on subs is
That and the hardly any of the champs that they won with in season 3 saw very little play in the entirety of this season.
i think an upgrade would be better.
